## Installation

### Stable version

> **NOTE:** This package haven't been published yet.

### Development version

You can install the development version of candlestickpatterns from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
devtools::install_github(
  repo = "kochiuyu/CandleStickPattern"
)
```
